mapper.select: select national_grant.id,userss.major,userss.class_id,userss.user_id,userss.username,userss.sex from userss,national_grant where userss.user_id = national_grant.userId;
select national_grant.id,userss.major,userss.class_id,userss.user_id,userss.username,userss.sex,national_grant.opinion from userss,national_grant where userss.user_id = national_grant.userId;
mapper.sql: id, userId, resident, income_source, month_income, family_sum, address, postal_code, situation, f_name1, age1, relation1, work_place1, f_name2, age2, relation2, work_place2, f_name3, age3, relation3, work_place3, f_name4, age4, relation4, work_place4, f_name5, age5, relation5, work_place5, apply_reason, opinion
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from national_grant
order by ${orderByClause}
